value.name: Former Ft. Bragg soldier gets prison time for sham marriages between US soldiers, foreign nationals
value.description: Ebenezer “Ben” Yeboah Asane was sentenced Thursday to 44 months in prison and 3 years of supervised release following his guilty plea in Aug. 2020.

value.name: Two Veteran Pilots Killed in Crash near Bakersfield
value.description: FRESNO, Calif. 68-year-old Alfred Goss and 54-year-old Steven Ballard both died. Goss was a well-known aviator in Kern County ... and even flew his vintage plane in last year's Legends over Madera ...

value.name: Ceremony marks return of war dead
value.description: All were based at the Culdrose base in Cornwall. After the Royal Navy group was Major Steven Ballard of the Royal Marines Landing Force Command Support Group who died of natural causes.

value.name: Should We Also Talk About When Mediation Fails?
value.description: In rightfully cautioning about being too enthusiastic about any one process option, Steven Ballard termed the phrase "enthusiastic mediation evangelist" which I gladly accept. Just as I am asking attorneys who don't mediate to self-reflect on their ...
